      • Course

        public Course​(java.lang.String name,
              java.lang.String title,
              java.lang.String section,
              int credits,
              java.lang.String instructorId,
              int enrollmentCap,
              java.lang.String meetingDays,
              int startTime,
              int endTime)
        Constructs a Course object with values for all fields.
        Parameters:
        name - name of Course
        title - title of Course
        section - section of Course
        credits - credit hours for Course
        instructorId - instructor's unity id
        enrollmentCap - the capacity of students for the course
        meetingDays - meeting days for Course as series of chars
        startTime - start time of the course in military time
        endTime - end time of the course in military time

      • setName

        private void setName​(java.lang.String name)
        Sets the Course's name. If the name is null, has a length less than 4 or greater than 6, an IllegalArgumentException is thrown.
        Parameters:
        name - the name to set
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if name is null or length is less than 4 or greater than 6 or is not valid according to validator

        public void setSection​(java.lang.String section)

        Parameters:
        section - the section to set
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if section is null or not exactly three digits

        public void setCredits​(int credits)

        Parameters:
        credits - the credits to set
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if credits is not between 1 and 5 (inclusive)
